member.name: T:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl
member.summary: Allows initialization/shutdown of the API when using Navisworks controls. Note that this is not the same as automation as you haven’t got a full Navisworks application running.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.ApplicationType
member.summary: Specifies the type of application that will be built using Navisworks controls. The default is MultipleDocument. Must be called before Initialize.
member.exception: The API has already been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.CloseFileAfterLoad
member.summary: By default Navisworks files are held open whilst being viewed.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.Initialize
member.summary: Initialise the API. Safe to call multiple times, each call must have matching call to Terminate.
member.exception: The program is trying to use a Navisworks control but the control can't find a Navisworks runtime to use. For example if no Navisworks product is installed.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.IsHardwareAccelerationActive
member.summary: Indicates whether Hardware Acceleration is actually being used.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.IsHardwareAccelerationAvailable
member.summary: Indicates whether Hardware Acceleration is available.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.IsInitialized
member.summary: Is the API initialized and ready for use ?

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.PreferHardwareAcceleration
member.summary: Specifies whether Hardware Acceleration should be used if available.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.RequestedRuntimeLanguage
member.summary: Specifies the language that Navisworks should prefer (if installed). Must be called before Initialize.
member.exception: The API has already been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.SelectionBehavior
member.summary: Specifies the Selection Behavior to be used during Picking.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.SetApplicationGui(Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.ApplicationParts.IApplicationGui)
member.summary: Sets/clears the implementation of IApplicationGui returned by Application.Gui.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationControl.Terminate
member.summary: Terminate use of the API. Each call must have a matching call to Initialize.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationType
member.summary: Describes the type of application that will be built using Navisworks controls.

member.name: F:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationType.MultipleDocument
member.summary: Multiple document application. Any number of DocumentControls may be created. A multiple document application supports a limited set of Navisworks APIs and Navisworks native file formats.

member.name: F:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ApplicationType.SingleDocument
member.summary: Single document application. Only one DocumentControl may be created. A single document application supports the complete set of Navisworks APIs and file readers.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.DocumentControl
member.summary: Standalone component that manages a Navisworks document

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.DocumentControl.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for DocumentControl

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.DocumentControl.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Overloaded constructor for DocumentControl. This should be used where possible.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.DocumentControl.Document
member.summary: Gets a reference to the Navisworks Document
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()
Attempt to access a second Document when ApplicationControl.ApplicationType is set to SingleDocument

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.DocumentControl.SetAsMainDocument
member.summary: Set this control's document as the main document for the application. This should be called once at the beginning of the application. This DocumentControl should last for the lifetime of the application and be the last DocumentControl to be disposed when the application terminates.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.DocumentControl.ShowCullingOptionsGui
member.summary: Shows the modal dialog for Culling Options.
member.exception: The API has not yet been initialized using ApplicationControl.Initialize()

member.name: T:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ViewControl
member.summary: Standalone control that provides a graphical view of the Document in a DocumentControl.

member.summary: Default constructor for ViewControl

member.summary: Determines if Selection dragging is enabled

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ViewControl.DocumentControl
member.summary: The DocumentControl that this view displays

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ViewControl.IsInputKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ViewControl.SetActiveView
member.summary: Sets this as the active view for the purposes of the DocumentControl

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Controls.ViewControl.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: When overridden provides access to specific windows messages handled by the control during its lifetime.
